Basketball
lead_paragraph: Changes in Eric Bledsoe’s high school academic performance have attracted the attention of N.C.A.A. investigators, dealing a possible blow to Coach John Calipari.
snippet: Changes in Eric Bledsoe’s high school academic performance have attracted the attention of N.C.A.A. investigators, dealing a possible blow to Coach John Calipari.
